hero.title: Deploy production AI agents in 3 weeks, not 6 months
hero.lead: Connect 50+ data sources, train Claude-powered agents on your metrics, and automate 68% of manual analysis tasks with built-in governance.
hero.subtext: Pre-built connectors for Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery, Postgres, Salesforce, HubSpot, and NetSuite. Zero-code schema mapping. SOC 2 Type II compliant.
hero.subHighlight: Average implementation: 14 days from kickoff to first production agent.

governedDataProducts.title: Automated data catalog
governedDataProducts.description: Auto-generate lineage graphs, data quality scores (0-100), and column-level access policies from existing infrastructure.

unifiedLakehouseFabric.title: Multi-source query engine
unifiedLakehouseFabric.description: Query across Parquet, Delta Lake, Iceberg, and 15+ SaaS APIs with sub-200ms latency. Single SQL interface.

agenticAutomation.title: Claude 3.5 agent runtime
agenticAutomation.description: Deploy agents with built-in RAG, SQL generation, and API orchestration. 99.7% task completion rate on structured workflows.

items.label: Active data pipelines
items.description: ETL jobs, streaming ingestions, and real-time CDC processes running in production across customer deployments.

items.label: Median query response
items.description: P95 latency for federated queries across Snowflake, S3, and PostgreSQL. 3.2TB/day average throughput.

items.label: Analyst time saved
items.description: Per analyst. Measured across 200+ deployments. Agents handle data prep, quality checks, and report generation autonomously.

features.heading: Production-grade data infrastructure in weeks, not quarters
features.subtitle: 50+ pre-built connectors, automatic schema evolution, and Claude 3.5-powered agents with 99.7% accuracy on SQL generation tasks.

connectEverySource.title: Universal data connectors
connectEverySource.description: 53 pre-built adapters: JDBC/ODBC databases, REST APIs (OAuth 2.0, API key), S3/GCS/Azure blob storage. Auto-detect schema changes every 15 minutes.

semanticControlPlane.title: Metrics layer + lineage graph
semanticControlPlane.description: Version-controlled metric definitions (dbt-compatible). Column-level lineage tracking across 10+ hops. Field-level PII detection with 94% precision.

agentAutomationStudio.title: Low-code agent builder
agentAutomationStudio.description: Visual workflow designer. Agents execute Python, SQL, and API calls. Built-in retry logic, error handling, and human-in-the-loop approvals for high-risk actions.

lakehouse.heading: Open table format lakehouse with ACID guarantees
lakehouse.description: Apache Iceberg + Delta Lake support. ACID transactions with snapshot isolation. 10PB+ data under management. Sub-second metadata operations on 500M+ file datasets.

unifiedGovernance.title: Multi-tenant data catalog
unifiedGovernance.description: Hive-compatible metastore. RBAC with row-level + column-level policies. Attribute-based access control (ABAC) for dynamic permissions. OpenLineage-compatible.

programmablePipelines.title: Orchestration-agnostic pipelines
programmablePipelines.description: Airflow, Prefect, Temporal, and Dagster integrations. Declarative data contracts with Great Expectations. Auto-retry failed partitions with exponential backoff.

compliantCollaboration.title: SOC 2 + GDPR compliance
compliantCollaboration.description: Data residency policies (US, EU, APAC). Encryption at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3). Automated PII masking. Full audit logs with tamper-proof signing.

secondary.heading: Real-time data activation
secondary.description: Sub-3-second latency from source change to agent action. CDC pipelines with exactly-once delivery guarantees. 99.95% uptime SLA.

adaptiveGuardrails.title: Policy engine with versioning
adaptiveGuardrails.description: 100+ pre-built policy templates. Test policies in shadow mode before enforcement. Automatic rollback on >5% error rate increase.

explainableDecisions.title: Full execution traces
explainableDecisions.description: Capture query plans, data versions, and model predictions. OpenTelemetry-compatible tracing. Reproduce any decision from the last 90 days.

lakehouseSignals.title: Operational metrics dashboard
lakehouseSignals.description: Track 47 SLIs: query latency (p50/p95/p99), data freshness, schema drift events, cost per query, agent success rates. Prometheus-compatible exports.

architecture.heading: Three-layer architecture: ingest, govern, activate
architecture.description: Horizontally scalable microservices. Kubernetes-native deployment. 50K+ events/sec per node. Auto-scaling based on queue depth + CPU utilization.

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Ingestion layer (streaming + batch)
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Kafka, Kinesis, and Pub/Sub consumers. Debezium CDC for MySQL, Postgres, SQL Server. Parquet/ORC writers with Z-order clustering. 100GB/min sustained throughput.

semanticGovernanceLayer.title: Governance + catalog layer
semanticGovernanceLayer.description: PostgreSQL-backed metastore. Redis cache for sub-10ms metadata lookups. Attribute-based policies evaluated at query time. Schema registry with Avro/Protobuf support.

agenticExecutionLayer.title: Agent runtime + orchestration
agenticExecutionLayer.description: Temporal for durable workflows. Claude 3.5 Sonnet with 128K context window. Vector store (Pinecone/Weaviate) for RAG. 4-second p95 response time for agent queries.

ai.heading: Production AI agents with 99.7% task success rate
ai.description: 200+ agents deployed across customer tenants. 45K autonomous actions/day. Claude 3.5 Sonnet with custom fine-tuning on your data dictionary and business logic.

insightCopilots.title: SQL-to-insight agents
insightCopilots.description: Generate executive summaries from 10M+ row datasets in <30 seconds. Automatic anomaly detection with 92% precision. Natural language explanations for every metric change.

composableSkills.title: Skill library (35+ pre-built)
composableSkills.description: SQL query generation (99.7% syntax accuracy), Python code execution (sandboxed), REST API calls, dbt model runs, Slack/email notifications, Salesforce record updates.

closedLoopActuators.title: Bidirectional SaaS sync
closedLoopActuators.description: Write back to Salesforce, Jira, HubSpot, NetSuite in <5 seconds. Conflict resolution with last-write-wins or custom merge strategies. Full changelog for compliance audits.

roadmap.heading: Product roadmap (Q1-Q2 2025)
roadmap.subtitle: 85% of features ship within 30 days of planned release date. Public changelog with bi-weekly updates.

marketplaceConnectors.title: Connector marketplace (Q1 2025)
marketplaceConnectors.description: 50+ community-contributed connectors: MongoDB, Elasticsearch, ClickHouse, Stripe, Shopify. One-click deployment via Terraform modules.

adaptiveGovernanceAi.title: ML-powered policy suggestions (Q1 2025)
adaptiveGovernanceAi.description: Analyze 90 days of access patterns and suggest least-privilege policies. Reduce over-permissioned users by 60% on average. Automated policy testing with synthetic queries.

autonomousFinopsSuites.title: Cost optimization agents (Q2 2025)
autonomousFinopsSuites.description: Auto-archive cold data (>180 days unused) to S3 Glacier. Detect duplicate materialized views. Predict compute costs 7 days ahead with 89% accuracy.

items.quote: We reduced analyst wait time from 4.5 hours to 12 minutes for ad-hoc data requests. AgentProvision agents auto-validate queries, check data quality, and generate Looker dashboardsâ€”all without human intervention.
items.author: Lina Cho
items.role: VP of Data Platform, Pulse Health (Series C, 850 employees)

items.quote: Our compliance team saved 22 hours/week by automating PII detection and access reviews. The platform flagged 847 over-permissioned accounts in the first week and auto-generated remediation tickets.
items.author: Elias Grant
items.role: Head of Data Governance, Nova Finance ($2.1B AUM)

cta.heading: Start with a 2-week proof of concept
cta.description: Fixed-price POC: $15K. Deploy 3 production agents in 14 days. Full platform access. Cancel anytime if ROI targets aren't met.
